instructions: Focus on code quality, security vulnerabilities, and best practices. Check for proper error handling, type safety, and test coverage.
ignorePatterns:
node_modules/**
dist/**
build/**
coverage/**
generated/**
prisma/migrations/**
**/*.lock
**/*.map

rules.rule: This is a TypeScript project using Hono.js for API routes, Prisma for database, and Better-Auth for authentication. Follow strict TypeScript practices.
Tests use Vitest with vitest-mock-extended for mocking. Ensure proper mock reset and cleanup.
